pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:2.1.7: khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅgaṃ.
